column4: ok. i try a more detailed question: how do i know what packages are "prebuilt" into the ubuntu kernel? this manual i got tells me i've got to patch the kernel if it isn't patched in order to make it work for my configuration. google = no luck, wiki = no luck. but maybe i just don't know the corresponding lockpick (keyword) yet
i'll have a cd to record in a couple of hours, will ps -x while it gets done if you're still there and don't know yet
Yeah, thanks. I'm stumped as to how Nautilus works and really could use some cues.
